name: CreateAiResponseForIssue
description:
Generate an AI response for a specific issue.

This tool creates an AI-generated response for a given issue by specifying the issue ID. It should be called when an automated response is required for issue resolution or documentation.

parameters.name: issue_id
parameters.description: The unique ID or number of the issue for which an AI response is required.

value_schema.description: The ID or number of the issue to create an AI response for.

parameters.name: ai_response_request_body
parameters.description: JSON object containing the AI agent ID and a flag to post the response as an internal note. Includes `ai_agent_id` (string) and `post_as_internal_note` (boolean).

ai_agent_id.description: The ID of the AI agent to use to create the AI response.

post_as_internal_note.description: Whether to post the AI response as an internal note on the issue.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the pylon API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or number of the issue to create an AI response for.

value_schema.description: The ID or number of the issue to create an AI response for.

ai_agent_id.description: The ID of the AI agent to use to create the AI response.

post_as_internal_note.description: Whether to post the AI response as an internal note on the issue.
